txt.en: You have encountered Glendower and his warband roaming the plains outside Middlemead.
You have encountered Glendower and his warband roaming the plains outside Middlemead. You should defeat him.
You have defeated the mighty Glendower and his warband. This blow will surely splinter the Dunlending forces in Kingstead for some time. You have done well to aid the people of Rohan.
You have defeated Glendower and brought peace to the King's lands.

While riding outside Middlemead, you have encountered a raiding warband of Dunlendings led by their chief, Glendower. Motivated by a desire to reclaim the lands once taken from them, you should defeat the Dunlendings before they can ride against the people of Kingstead.
A mighty Dunlending chief has ridden into the King's lands, threatening to raze every town in his path.
The Dunlending, Glendower, and his warband have escaped your attack. You should track and defeat him.
